definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: But we continue to steer a steady course through choppy waters, " he added.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们继续稳定地通过波涛汹涌的水域”他补充道。

sentences.english: For eons,the pounding waves ate away at the shoreline.
sentences.chinese: 长时期以来波涛汹涌的海浪冲蚀着海岸线。

sentences.english: On hot days I hang out where the waves are forming.
sentences.chinese: 一个大热天，我住在一个波涛汹涌的地方。

sentences.english: The rolling sea is another seascape of surging waves.
sentences.chinese: 海上扬波，又是一幅波涛汹涌的海景。

sentences.english: The ship plunged dangerously in the rough sea.
sentences.chinese: 船在波涛汹涌的大海上危险地颠簸着。

sentences.english: The sea is running high; the boat is rocking like a cradle.
sentences.chinese: 海上波涛汹涌，小船像摇篮似的来回摇摆。

sentences.english: The sea was rough and half the passengers were seasick.
sentences.chinese: 海面波涛汹涌，半数旅客晕船。

sentences.english: And Columbus sailed westward for many weeks through rough seas.
sentences.chinese: 哥伦布在波涛汹涌的大海上向西航行了数周后。

sentences.english: They managed to keep the boat from broaching to in the heavy seas.
sentences.chinese: 他们设法使船在波涛汹涌的海面上不突然横转。

sentences.english: They work in Miami, where hot girls and hot guys fill the streets.
sentences.chinese: 他们的地点在迈阿密，满街都是靓仔靓女，波涛汹涌。

definition: one climax follows another (of thrilling story)
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
lit. breeze is still, waves are quiet (idiom); tranquil environment/all is quiet/a dead calm (at sea)
to roll over and over (of billows or clouds)
to beat against the shore (of waves)
spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
